short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows latest price of STRAT/BTC for bittrex.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is simple extension shows STRAT/BTC price from bittrex exchange

Extension Features: 
1. STRAT price in BTC
2. Notify you When Price +-
3. Control refresh time (1-min by default)
